subsection_content: Ascaris lumbricoides roundworm is an intestinal parasite that causes the most common disease among human parasites. People get sick by consuming food and water sources containing roundworm eggs, especially in areas without modern toilets. Sick people often have no symptoms, but when the intestines contain many roundworms, they can experience problems in the lungs, intestines... (1)
subsection_title: benh giun dua.json. What are roundworms?
subsection_data:
benh giun dua.json. What are roundworms?
Ascaris lumbricoides roundworm is an intestinal parasite that causes the most common disease among human parasites. People get sick by consuming food and water sources containing roundworm eggs, especially in areas without modern toilets. Sick people often have no symptoms, but when the intestines contain many roundworms, they can experience problems in the lungs, intestines... (1)
